events.message: The applicant has submitted the mortgage application for a new property located in downtown.
Application has been categorised under Mortgage Loan based on keywords like house and property.
John Smith, our mortgage specialist, has been assigned to oversee the application processing and further communication.
The mortgage application has undergone initial review checking for completeness and eligibility criteria compliance.
Requested applicant to provide proof of income, property appraisal report, and recent bank statements for verification.
The applicant has submitted all required documents including the income proof, appraisal report, and bank statements.
Credit check has been completed showing a strong credit score and no recent defaults, supporting loan approval.
Risk assessment conducted indicates moderate risk but within acceptable underwriting parameters.
A mortgage offer with competitive interest rates and repayment terms has been presented to the applicant.
Applicant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the terms and eager to proceed with acceptance.
The mortgage application has been officially approved by the underwriting team after thorough review.
Funds have been disbursed to the sellerâ€™s account to complete the property purchase as agreed.
Follow-up call scheduled with applicant to ensure all documents are retained and answer any post-funding questions.
The mortgage loan application case has been successfully closed after funding and follow-up.
